amendatorysection.para: Every person who shall harbor about his or her premises a collarless dog for the space of ten days shall be taken and held as the owner, and shall be liable for all damages which such dog shall commit.

annotation.para: Dog that assails people along a public road is a nuisance and may be killed by person assailed. Nehr v. State, 35 Neb. 638, 53 N.W. 589 (1892).
